word: NOTE 12. PAGE 578.\97THERE ARE STILL OBSERVERS OF THE BIBLE SABBATH IN ABYSSINIA. JOSEPH WOLFF, IN HIS JOURNAL FOR 1838, GIVING AN ACCOUNT OF HIS VISIT TO THAT COUNTRY, SAYS THAT \93THE SABBATH OF THE JEWS, I. E., SATURDAY, IS KEPT STRICTLY AMONG THE ABYSSINIANS IN THE PROVINCE OF HAMAZIEN.\94
